pages.title: Bag of Holding
pages.text: Placing an [#](bb00bb)Ender Chest[#](), opening it, and mining it with an enchanted pickaxe is not what you think of as fun.\That's why you invented this thing.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Just open it and the contents of your [#](bb00bb)Ender Chest[#]() are right there.
